Package com.foreach.across.modules.bootstrapui.elements.builder

Class OptionsFormElementBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilderSupport<T,SELF>
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.ContainerViewElementBuilderSupport<T,SELF>
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.AbstractNodeViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.AbstractNodeViewElement,OptionsFormElementBuilder>
com.foreach.across.modules.bootstrapui.elements.builder.OptionsFormElementBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.HtmlViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.AbstractNodeViewElement,OptionsFormElementBuilder>, com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.AbstractNodeViewElement>
public class OptionsFormElementBuilder extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.AbstractNodeViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.AbstractNodeViewElement,OptionsFormElementBuilder>
Responsible for building option lists as SELECT, RADIO, TOGGLE or MULTI CHECKBOX. Takes a collection of OptionFormElementBuilders and will apply the global type to them, no matter what type they were originally defined with.
Author:
Arne Vandamme

    • checkbox

      public OptionsFormElementBuilder checkbox()
      Will generate a multiple checkbox control. Checkbox always allows multiple values.
      Returns:
      current builder

    • radio

      public OptionsFormElementBuilder radio()
      Will generate a radio button list. Radio button list never allows multiple values.
      Returns:
      current builder

    • toggle

      public OptionsFormElementBuilder toggle()
      Will generate a toggle button list. Toggle always allows multiple values.
      Returns:
      current builder

    • select

      public OptionsFormElementBuilder select()
      Will generate a select box.
      Returns:
      current builder

    • select

      public OptionsFormElementBuilder select(SelectFormElementConfiguration configuration)
      Will generate a boostrap-select box with the given configuration. If the configuration is null, will revert to a regular select box.
      Returns:
      current builder
